bibl.title: Egyptological Studies in Honor of Richard A. Parker
bibl.note: Preliminary study of aspects of the economic and social role of the Egyptian priesthood in Ptolemaic Egypt, based largely on Demotic materials.
Johnson Janet H., The Role of the Egyptian Priesthood in Ptolemaic Egypt.
Leonard H. Lesko (Ed.), Egyptological Studies in Honor of Richard A. Parker (Hanover - London, 1986) pp. 70-84.
